content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), a boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and a steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) and transport belts at positions (x=63.5, y=-53.5) and (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have fuel before attempting to use them.
- Ensure that boilers have fuel before attempting to use them.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network before attempting to use them.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have source items before attempting to use them.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before attempting to use them.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No variables have been assigned.
